scripts.k8s:token: vagrant ssh k8s-master -c "kubectl -n kube-system describe secret $(kubectl -n kube-system get secret | grep admin-user | awk '{print $1}')"
scripts.k8s:dashboard: yarn k8s:start-dashboard & yarn k8s:token & echo 'navigate to http://127.0.0.1:8001/api/v1/namespaces/kube-system/services/https:kubernetes-dashboard:/proxy'
